query: SELECT id, region_id, status, scan_type, duration, FROM_UNIXTIME(UNIX_TIMESTAMP(created_at)) as time FROM monitoring_logs ORDER BY created_at DESC LIMIT 3
command: mysql --batch --raw --column-names --default-character-set=utf8mb4 --host gateway03.us-east-1.prod.aws.tidbcloud.com --port 4000 --user 2LSjgciXE5U7gJN.root --database AE5tzfuADY2nWPRKhfHJC3 --execute SELECT id, region_id, status, scan_type, duration, FROM_UNIXTIME(UNIX_TIMESTAMP(created_at)) as time FROM monitoring_logs ORDER BY created_at DESC LIMIT 3
